summary: This mod allows you to make Drugs and sell them at the drunken huntsman
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to make Drugs and sell them at the drunken huntsman.You can buy there as well. You can make drugs at your farm to know what to use to make it go to the drunken huntsman and read the books on the counter they will tell you how to make a bong or skooma also selling them will get you big buck. 

Where\'s my Farm ? Look at the picture showing on the map at the top.

How do I make them ? Go to the drunken huntsman and read the books on the counter.

I can\'t make them ? you make them in a cooking pot.

Y can\'t I buy ingredients ? Not sure 

Enjoy That\'s all that you need to know
author: UltraDevice
